_header: For when the hound gnaweth the bone
_description: One proverbial couplet in a sermon

BLRoy18Bxxiii.Transcription:
ffor when þe hounde knawithe þe boneþan of felishippe
                    kepeþ he none

Ross,  W. O.,
                        ed.
